ISSUE.TITLE: ginkgo: `no_proxy` doesn't work with `ginkgo -nodes <any>`
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: `Podman run two containers with the same IP` test needs `no_proxy` in proxy environment (#15681). `response, err := http.Get(fmt.Sprintf("http://%s", ip))` uses an internal networking (nginx). Therefore, this test needs `os.Setenv("no_proxy", ip)`. However, `ginkgo -nodes <any>` command looks to ignore `no_proxy` settings and the test is failed. I don't know why `no_proxy` doesn't work with `ginkgo -nodes <any>`. <details> <summary>temporary change for debug</summary> ``` diff --git a/test/e2e/run_staticip_test.go b/test/e2e/run_staticip_test.go index 057fbf775..b547423d1 100644 --- a/test/e2e/run_staticip_test.go +++ b/test/e2e/run_staticip_test.go @@ -99,7 +99,7 @@ var _ = Describe("Podman run with --ip flag", func() { Expect(result.OutputToString()).To(ContainSubstring(intName)) }) - It("Podman run two containers with the same IP", func() { + FIt("Podman run two containers with the same IP", func() { ip := GetRandomIPAddress() result := podmanTest.Podman([]string{"run", "-d", "--name", "nginx", "--ip", ip, NGINX_IMAGE}) result.WaitWithDefaultTimeout() @@ -112,7 +112,8 @@ var _ = Describe("Podman run with --ip flag", func() { defer os.Unsetenv("no_proxy") } os.Setenv("no_proxy", ip) - for retries := 20; retries > 0; retries-- { + fmt.Println(os.Getenv("no_proxy")) + for retries := 4; retries > 0; retries-- { response, err := http.Get(fmt.Sprintf("http://%s", ip)) if err == nil && response.StatusCode == http.StatusOK { break ``` </details> <details> <summary>Without -nodes option (success)</summary> ``` # PODMAN_BINARY=$(which podman) PODMAN_REMOTE_BINARY=$(which podman-remote) NETWORK_BACKEND=netavark OCI_RUNTIME=crun GOPATH=~/go ginkgo -tags "remote" -v test/e2e/. COMMIT.MESSAGE: e2e: fix run_staticip_test about no_proxy http.Get() could not recognize no_proxy with "ginkgo -nodes <any>". Therefore, we set http.Client not to use a proxy instead of os.Setenv(). Fixes #17135 Signed-off-by: Toshiki Sonoda <sonoda.toshiki@fujitsu.com>
